labs.notes: CRUD buttons visible only to professor/admin; guests/students only view.

groups.notes: Students can join only if enrolled to the related course and group not full. Use DB transaction/lock to avoid overbooking.

students_list.notes: Do not expose list publicly. If kept, show limited fields and opt-in visibility.

professors_list.notes: Link opens external profile with professor.id parameter.

registrations.notes: Students create/cancel own registrations. Professors manage registrations for their groups.

absences.notes: All edits must be logged (who, old, new, timestamp, reason).

user_management.notes: Role assignment only via admin panel.

global_notes: Frontend visibility is only UX. All endpoints must enforce server-side authorization.
Use principle of least privilege. Soft-delete and audit-critical changes.
Mask PII (emails/AM) in public views; ensure CSRF, input validation and escape output.
